functions.name: set
functions.function: Set an alias for your account
inputHelp: A never before used alias. Between 3 and 20 words long

inputHelp: Nonce - the transaction serial number that resulted in the formation of the TruCode
A never before used alias. Between 3 and 20 words long

functions.function: Check if an alias is already in use
